climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards. Soil Association certifies organic products and is a Certification Body for the COSMOS-standard, which ensures products are genuine organic or natural cosmetics. ORGANIC

The package width of the product is 11.2 centimeters

body.description: NATRACARE award winning organic cotton baby wipes are soft, gentle and effective cleansing wipes for daily use on baby's sensitive skin. Our soft and strong, certified organic, 100 percent cotton baby wipes are infused with organic essential oils of apricot, linden and chamomile as well as natural plant extracts, all of which will cleanse and refresh, leaving the skin softened. The gentle formula is contains no detergents such as sodium lauryl Sulphate (SLS) or any of its close relatives, parabens, SHG and other types of Formaldehyde releasing preservatives. You do not need to be a baby to use our baby wipes 1 pack of 50 wipes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally found the perfect wipes
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE these!!! Been searching forever for BIODEGRADABLE baby wipes that don't suck in one way or another. They smell AMAZING, they are never too wet or too dry, and they have the perfect amount of stretch and grip, so I use far fewer than I did with other brands, rarely more than one for a change. We cloth diaper our little dude, and use cloth wipes as well but want some disposable wipes for poop and on-the-go, but I hate to use polyester ones that won't break down in landfill and I want safe, gentle ingredients. Used Jackson Reece for a long time, but they increasingly would not pop up when you pulled one out and left you digging, we finally got fed up with it. I like water wipes, but not biodegradable. Tried Honest, Joonya, and others, but then Natracare and I loved them from the very first one, they're perfect!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2011
reviews.reviewText: I was hoping these wipes would be good as I use a lot of other products from naturacare (sanitary pads and nursing pads). I like that they are kinder to the environment and made from organic cotton, however I was unhappy that these were heavily scented. I've returned them and will go with one that is unscented instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wipes, especially love the ORGANIC cotton
reviews.reviewText: LOVE these wipes. They are strong, not strong scented, delicate enougn for bum and face. just perfect. I love that they use organic cotton. Some Other brands don't use organic cotton so they take pesticide laden cotton then use organic ingredients which seems pointless to me. The package states they use 100 percent organic cotton and 82 percent organic ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use these for myself, not a baby. They do not sting or irritate me. They never shred and are a good thickness. I love that they don't have any dangerous ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2018
reviews.reviewText: These may be thin, but they do the job and they smell wonderful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, strong, Cleansing
reviews.reviewText: soft, strong, cleansing. using as adult's wipes, and they're great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Will not purchase these again. The scent is completely ...
reviews.reviewText: Will not purchase these again. The scent is completely overwhelming for me ... I can just imagine how it is to my newborn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2011
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great baby wipes!
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are great. They smell very pleasant, have an appropriately thickness (not flimsy at all) and clean very well as they have more moisture than many of the non-toxic wipes that I've tried. I am only giving them 4 stars since there are only 50 wipes to a package. For something that needs to be ordered online, it would be nice to have more wipes in each container.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Plastic free but arrived in loads if unnecessary plastic packaging
reviews.reviewText: I bought those pretty dam expensive organic PLASTIC FREE wet wipes to decrease the amount of single-use plastic in my life. They arrived in a plastic envelope AND wrapped up in plastic foil.
